title:
Projective embedding of degenerating family of K\"ahler-Einstein
  manifolds of negative curvature
abstract:
We study the Bergman embeddings of degenerating families of
K\"{a}hler-Einsten manifolds of negative curvature. In one special case, we
show that we can construct orthonormal bases so that the induced Bergman
embeddings converge to the Bergman embedding of the limit space together with
bubbles.
